text.autoconfig.indypets.title: Independent Pets
text.autoconfig.indypets.option.silentMo: Use particle effects instead of text messages
text.autoconfig.indypets.option.independ: Modded pets are independent by default
text.autoconfig.indypets.option.blocklis:
Completely disables IndyPets for specific pet types.
Useful for modded pets with custom follow mechanics.
"modid:*" disables all pets of a given mod.
text.autoconfig.indypets.option.interact:
Disables IndyPets' sneak interact for specific pet types.
Useful for modded pets with custom sneak interact behaviors.
"modid:*" disables sneak interact for all pets of a given mod.
Pet idenpendence can still be changed by whistling or via
the Interact keybinding.

IndyPets' sneak interact will only be used if the chosen item is held.
Useful for modded pets with custom sneak interact behaviors.
Leave blank to ignore the held item.
text.autoconfig.indypets.option.position: Works with Sound Physics Remastered, but the sound won't move with the player.
text.autoconfig.indypets.option.homeRadi:
Pets can roam within this block radius of their
home before turning back.
"Home" is where the pet was last set independent.
text.autoconfig.indypets.option.innerHom:
Effectively defines an inner radius.
Once pets leave it, they are more likely
to turn back the further out they are.

100%: Pets will only turn back once outside their home
0%: Pets may always think "I should turn back"
